data.title: Connie Booth
data.meta_description: Connie Booth (born 2 December 1940) is an American-born retired writer, actress, comedian and psychotherapist based in Britain. data.text:
Connie Booth (born 2 December 1940) is an American-born retired writer, actress, comedian and psychotherapist based in Britain. She has appeared in several British television programmes and films, including her role as Polly Sherman on BBC2's Fawlty Towers, which she co-wrote with her then-husband John Cleese.
